name: THE ADVENTURE OF A KNIGHT
description:
A simple platform game where your goal is to pick up the keys to be able to open the doors to pass the stage (in development)

tileset: 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io)

Music: royalty free music by Kevin MacLeod

Controls

W: Jump

A-D: Movement

F: Pass level (on the door)
